name: BewareOfWolves-ThePlanetIsLava-CheckpointChaser
description:
Beware of Wolves

A rabbit runs through changing seasons back to it's burrow to stay alive it must outrun the wolf that is in it's pursuit. Beware of Wolves is a metaphoric interactive experience based on the theme of the changing seasons. It portraits the changing seasons of our environment and also that life and death are changing season for us all as well.

The game idea is based on a biblical scripture from the book of Ecclesiastes 3: “To every thing there is a season, and a time to every purpose under the heaven: A time to be born, and a time to die; a time to plant, and a time to pluck up that which is planted;”. The game defines the life and death of the player as seasons. The player moves across the screen. The aesthetics of the background and foreground content is themed to have literal seasonal context.

A rabbit runs in the foreground as the symbol of life. The rabbit runs across the landscapes of different seasons (Summer ,Autumn, Winter, Spring), and is chased by a predator, a wolf. The wolf eventually catches up with the rabbit near the end of the landscape bringing the season of the rabbit's life to an end.

Developed in Processing 3

The Planet is Lava

This is a single click (Spacebar) game where a spaceman must escape a planet of lava. To escape the player must jump from crate to crate till eventually, they reach a spaceship and therefore escape. The goal is simple yet enough of a task that it is challenging. The menus guide the player through the game if needed, there is always information clearly written.

Second Level included. Game developed in Unity Engine

Checkpoint Chaser

Race around a track to achieve your best time. Once you have completed your first lap you will be presented with obstacles on the track that are graded to different levels of difficulty. There are three levels of difficulty.

Game developed in Unity Engine

Created and Developed by David Clark
